BLOG_DESC:
Dev instance of FlaskBlog, things *will* break at times, so don't use it for other than testing

**Login:** writer
**Password:** writer

Public instance can be found here: [https://flb.mstn.helioho.st](https://flb.mstn.helioho.st)
DEFAULT_DESC:
If you see this message, congratulations, FlaskBlog is installed successfully!
**Further configuration is required.**
You can now register your account, give it posting perms via [phpMyAdmin](https://www.phpmyadmin.net/) and start writing!
You can also disable registration afterwards to not let random people register to your blog.
**Note:** This is the default description, which appears if `BLOG_DESC` variable is not set.
